official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the mandatory-separation age for members of the Capitol Police be conformed to the mandatory-separation age for Federal law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Changes the mandatory separation age from 55 to 57 for a member of the Capitol Police who is eligible for immediate retirement.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the mandatory-separation age for members of the Capitol Police be conformed to the mandatory-separation age for Federal law enforcement officers.
